data.text: @Lucia_nurse_74 Hoop dat de 'young global leaders' gevaccineerd zijn
@curlyhairben @Lucia_nurse_74 🤷‍♀️here’s hoping it will calm down with time. The body naturally clears out the jab but there are protocols to help it…easy to find.

@curlyhairben @Lucia_nurse_74 ❤️If it isn’t from the jab, try gluten free. It took my inflammation marker from 6to 2. I don’t have arthritis but 5 is high. Most autoimmune suffers can benefit— 3 doctors have told me.
@DDenbak @Lucia_nurse_74 I start cortisone this month. If that doesn’t work it’s MRI time. It’s taken 3 months to get to this level of pain. I’m devastated by what I was forced to do to be employed
@curlyhairben @Lucia_nurse_74 My friend got her booster about a month ago…the same.
@DDenbak @Lucia_nurse_74 I’m in agony. My doctor is like “I wonder what set it off?”  I just shook my head.

@curlyhairben @Lucia_nurse_74 I know of two people whose arthritis flared although they have not connected the dots. A recent article said the lipid nano particles used to deliver the mRNA cause inflammation.
@Lucia_nurse_74 @jbirdthoughts The last 9 pages of this https://t.co/cWcMNNFOed
